thread.title: Expect 'major' disruption as S.F. races to fix old water pipes
thread.title_full: Expect 'major' disruption as S.F. races to fix old water pipes - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Joaquin Palomino
title: Expect 'major' disruption as S.F. races to fix old water pipes
text:
Photo: Lea Suzuki, The Chronicle Cesar Robles (center) of the Water Department measures to align water pipes on Haight Street in San Francisco. Cesar Robles (center) of the Water Department measures to align...
Many of San Francisco’s 1,250 miles of water pipes need to be repaired or replaced, requiring years of digging as the city races to fix an aging system, documents and data from the San Francisco Public Utilities Commission reveal. Cesar Robles (center) of the Water Department measures to align water pipes on Haight Street in San Francisco. Cesar Robles (center) of the Water Department measures to align...
